title: Wednesday Post Show (07-20-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (07-20-22)
description:
Bobby reveals what Craig Morgan’s response was to his question about him asking how much it would cost to play a wedding. Bobby shares an idea of a segment on the show that he wants to see make happen where the members of the show will have to learn an instrument. We get to the bottom of why Lunchbox’s hair is out of control. Bobby talks about going to dinner with his wife and Eddie. We get into a discussion if you can hang out with people of the opposite sex if you’re married.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

We get to the bottom of why Lunchbox’s hair is out of control. Bobby talks about going to dinner with his wife and Eddie. We get into a discussion if you can hang out with people of the opposite sex if you’re married.
